sentences.english: Liz found his criticisms hard to take .
sentences.chinese: 利兹觉得他的批评很难接受。

sentences.english: I just can’t take any more (= can’t deal with a bad situation any longer ) .
sentences.chinese: 我再也受不了了。

sentences.english: Staff have agreed to take a 2% pay cut.
sentences.chinese: 员工同意接受2%的降薪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拿走； 接受， 接纳
detailed_translations.english: to accept or choose something that is offered, suggested, or given to you

name: off
trans: prep. 离开；脱落,adv. 切断；走开,adj. 远离的；空闲的

sentences.english: He got into his car and drove off.
sentences.chinese: 他上了车，随即开车走了。

sentences.english: Will someone switch the radio off?
sentences.chinese: 谁把收音机关掉好吗？

detailed_translations.english: away from a place

name: intake
trans: n. 摄取量；通风口；引入口；引入的量

sentences.english: Your intake of alcohol should not exceed two units per day.
sentences.chinese: 你每天酒精摄入量不能超过两个单位。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of food, drink etc that you take into your body

name: mainstream
trans: n. 主流

sentences.english: Genet started as a rebel, but soon became part of the literary mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 热内起初很叛逆，但不久就回归了文学主流。

detailed_translations.english: the most usual ideas or methods, or the people who have these ideas or methods

name: masterpiece
trans: n. 杰作；绝无仅有的人

sentences.english: Mary Shelley was just 18 when she wrote the horror masterpiece ‘Frankenstein’.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽•雪莱创作《科学怪人》这部恐怖小说名作的时候年仅18岁。

detailed_translations.english: a work of art, a piece of writing or music etc that is of very high quality or that is the best that a particular artist, writer etc has produced

name: middle-class
trans: adj. 中产阶级的；中层社会的

name: moreover
trans: adv. 而且；此外

sentences.english: The rent is reasonable and, moreover, the location is perfect.
sentences.chinese: 租金合理，而且位置也非常好。

sentences.english: The source of the information is irrelevant. Moreover, the information need not be confidential.
sentences.chinese: 信息来源无关紧要，而且也不一定必须是机密的。

detailed_translations.english: in addition – used to introduce information that adds to or supports what has previously been said

name: old-fashioned
trans: adj. 老式的；过时的；守旧的

name: outskirts
trans: n. 市郊，郊区

sentences.english: The rubble was then dumped in a municipal landfill site on the outskirts of Florence.
sentences.chinese: 这堆碎石后来被倾倒在佛罗伦萨市郊的一处垃圾填埋场。

sentences.english: On the outskirts of every city I saw, there was a veritable forest of apartment blocks under construction.
sentences.chinese: 在我造访的每个城市的郊区，一栋栋在建公寓楼确实是鳞次栉比。

sentences.english: After abandoning his devastated home on the outskirts of Damascus, Mustafa, his wife, children and aging parents spent months seeking safety in one town after another.
sentences.chinese: 在抛弃大马士革郊区破坏殆尽的家后，穆斯塔法和他的妻子，孩子几年迈的父母花了几个月的时间在一个又一个小镇躲避战祸。

detailed_translations.english: the parts of a town or city that are furthest from the centre

name: pastime
trans: n. 娱乐，消遣

sentences.english: Reading was her favourite pastime.
sentences.chinese: 阅读是她最喜爱的消遣方式。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do because you think it is enjoyable or interesting

name: payroll
trans: n. 工资单；在册职工人数；工资名单

sentences.english: the annual payroll was $88 million
sentences.chinese: 年度工资总支出为8,800万美元

detailed_translations.english: the total amount of wages paid to all the people working in a particular company or industry

name: somewhat
trans: n. 几分；某物,adv. 有点；多少；几分；稍微

sentences.english: Things have changed somewhat since then.
sentences.chinese: 从那时候起，情况就有些不一样了。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little but not very

name: sunset
trans: n. 日落，傍晚

sentences.english: a glorious sunset
sentences.chinese: 壮丽的日落景象

detailed_translations.english: the time of day when the sun disappears and night begins

name: takeoff
trans: 起飞,开始,起跳,起跳的，起飞的

sentences.english: What time is takeoff?
sentences.chinese: 起飞时间是什么时候？

detailed_translations.english: Takeoff is the beginning of a flight, when an aircraft leaves the ground

name: there
trans: n. 那个地方,adv. 在那里；在那边；在那点上,int. 你瞧

sentences.english: We could go back to my cottage and have lunch there.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以回到我的小屋去吃午饭。

sentences.english: Scotland? I’ve always wanted to go there.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰？我一直想去那儿。

sentences.english: Hold it right there and don’t move.
sentences.chinese: 就站在那里，不要动。

sentences.english: Can you pass me that wine glass there?
sentences.chinese: 你能把那个葡萄酒杯递给我吗？

sentences.english: Look, there’s that bookshop I was telling you about.
sentences.chinese: 看，那就是我跟你说过的那家书店。

sentences.english: Who’s that man over there ?
sentences.chinese: 那边的那个男人是谁？

sentences.english: It’s too far to drive there and back in one day.
sentences.chinese: 一天开车来回太远了。

sentences.english: Are we going to get there (= arrive ) before the banks close?
sentences.chinese: 银行关门之前，我们到得了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 在那里；在那边；在那点上
detailed_translations.english: in or to a particular place that is not where you are
used to express satisfaction that you have been proved right or that you have done what you intended to do

name: by
trans: prep. 通过；被；依据；经由；在附近；在……之前,adv. 通过；经过；附近； 白俄罗斯的国家代码顶级域名

sentences.english: She stood by the window.
sentences.chinese: 她站在窗边。

sentences.english: I was attacked by a dog.
sentences.chinese: 我被一条狗袭击。

sentences.english: a church designed by the famous architect, Sir Christopher Wren
sentences.chinese: 著名建筑师克里斯托弗·雷恩爵士设计的一座教堂

sentences.english: We are all alarmed by the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们都对暴力罪案的增加感到忧虑。

sentences.english: interference by the state in the affairs of the Church
sentences.chinese: 国家对教会事务的干预

sentences.english: his appointment by the BBC as a producer
sentences.chinese: 英国广播公司委任他为制片人

detailed_translations.english: beside or near something

name: trade
trans: n. 贸易，交易；行业；职业,vt. 用…进行交换,vi. 交易，买卖；以物易物

sentences.english: They had to travel into town to trade the produce from their farm.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不到镇上去出售他们农场的产品。

sentences.english: We traded necklaces.
sentences.chinese: 我们交换了项链。

detailed_translations.english: to buy and sell goods, services etc as your job or business

name: mark
trans: n. 标志；马克；符号；痕迹；分数,vi. 作记号,vt. .标志；做标记于；打分数,n. . 标志；做标记于；打分数

sentences.english: The kitten is mainly white with black marks on her back.
sentences.chinese: 小猫身体基本为白色，背上有黑色斑点。

sentences.english: Make a mark at the bottom of the page.
sentences.chinese: 在页末做个记号。

sentences.english: A simple wooden cross marked her grave.
sentences.chinese: 一个简单的木十字架标出了她坟墓的位置。

detailed_translations.english: a small area of darker or lighter colour on a plain surface such as a person’s skin or an animal’s fur
to show where something is

name: under
trans: prep. 低于，少于；在...之下,adj. 下面的；从属的,adv. 在下面；在下方

sentences.english: These toys are not suitable for children under five.
sentences.chinese: 这些玩具不适合五岁以下的儿童玩。

sentences.english: Most of the events listed cost under £60.
sentences.chinese: 所列活动项目的花费大多低于 60 英镑。

sentences.english: I spend just under four hours a day seeing customers.
sentences.chinese: 我一天接待客户所花的时间将近四小时。

sentences.english: He took a deep breath before he went under.
sentences.chinese: 他在钻下水前深深地吸了口气。

detailed_translations.english: less than a particular number, amount, age, or price
Under is also an adverb

name: develop
trans: vi. 发育；生长；进化；显露,vt. 开发；进步；使成长；使显影

sentences.english: Knowledge in the field of genetics has been developing very rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 遗传学领域的知识发展非常迅速。

sentences.english: Corsica has developed its economy around the tourist industry.
sentences.chinese: 科西嘉岛的经济是围绕旅游业发展起来的。

sentences.english: exercises to develop muscle strength
sentences.chinese: 锻炼肌肉力量的运动

sentences.english: He had developed a certain affection for me.
sentences.chinese: 他对我产生了一些好感。

sentences.english: The land was developed for low-cost housing.
sentences.chinese: 这块土地被开发建造廉价住宅。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually grow or become bigger, more advanced, stronger, etc.; to make sth do this

name: up
trans: prep. 在…之上；向…的较高处,n. 上升；繁荣,adj. 涨的；起床的；向上的,adv. 起来；上涨；向上

sentences.english: We walked slowly up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 我们慢慢地爬上山。

sentences.english: She picked her jacket up off the floor.
sentences.chinese: 她从地板上捡起外套。

sentences.english: paths leading up into the mountains
sentences.chinese: 通往山里的小径

sentences.english: Tim had climbed up a tree to get a better view.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆爬到了树上，以便看得更清楚。

sentences.english: Put up your hand if you know the answer.
sentences.chinese: 如果知道答案就举手。

sentences.english: The water was getting up my nose.
sentences.chinese: 水已经没到了我的鼻子。

sentences.english: Karen lay on her back, staring up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦仰卧着，盯着天花板。

sentences.english: Are you sure you should be up?
sentences.chinese: 你肯定你该起床了吗?

sentences.english: These days they were up at the crack of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 这些天他们在破晓时就起床。

detailed_translations.english: towards a higher place or position
If you are up, you are not in bed

name: date
trans: n. 日期；约会；年代；枣椰子,vt. 确定…年代；和…约会,vi. 过时；注明日期；始于（某一历史时期）

sentences.english: The date on the letter was 30th August 1962.
sentences.chinese: 信上的日期是1962年8月30日。

sentences.english: What’s today’s date?
sentences.chinese: 今天几号？

sentences.english: Make sure you sign and date it at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 一定要在底下签上姓名和日期。

detailed_translations.english: a particular day of the month or year, especially shown by a number
to write or print the date on something

name: grade
trans: n. 年级；等级；成绩；级别；阶段,vt. 评分；把…分等级,vi. 分等级；逐渐变化

sentences.english: Pencils are graded according to softness.
sentences.chinese: 铅笔按软硬度分级。

sentences.english: The best grades of tea are expensive.
sentences.chinese: 最上等的茶叶价格很贵。

detailed_translations.english: to say what level of a quality something has, or what standard it is
a particular level of quality that a product, material etc has

name: right
trans: n. 正确；右边；正义,adj. 正确的；直接的；右方的,vt. 纠正,adv. 正确地；恰当地；彻底地,vi. 复正；恢复平稳

sentences.english: Yes, that’s the right answer .
sentences.chinese: 对，回答正确。

sentences.english: Is that the right time ?
sentences.chinese: 那个时间对吗？

sentences.english: I got most of the questions right .
sentences.chinese: 大部分问题我都答对了。

sentences.english: His ideas have now been proved right .
sentences.chinese: 他的观点现已证明是对的。

detailed_translations.english: a statement or piece of information that is right is correct and based on true facts
exactly in a particular position or place
used to check if what you have said is correct
exactly in a particular position or place

name: to
trans: prep. 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向,adv. 向前；（门等）关上

sentences.english: The wind blew the door to.
sentences.chinese: 风把门吹上了。

detailed_translations.english: if a door is pushed to, it closes or almost closes

detailed_translations.chinese: 到；向；（表示时间、方向）朝…方向
detailed_translations.english: used to say where someone or something goes

detailed_translations.chinese: (To)人名；(柬)多；(中)脱(普通话·威妥玛)

name: water
trans: n. 水；海水；雨水；海域，大片的水,vt. 使湿；供以水；给…浇水,vi. 加水；流泪；流口水

sentences.english: There’s water all over the bathroom floor.
sentences.chinese: 浴室地面上都是水。

sentences.english: Does anyone want a drink of water?
sentences.chinese: 有谁想喝杯水吗？

sentences.english: a glass of sparkling mineral water
sentences.chinese: 一杯有气矿泉水

sentences.english: All rooms have hot and cold running water.
sentences.chinese: 所有房间都有冷热自来水供应。

sentences.english: Pour boiling water over the rice and let it soak.
sentences.chinese: 在大米中倒入沸水浸泡。

sentences.english: a fresh water spring
sentences.chinese: 淡水泉

sentences.english: When dealing with a burst pipe, always turn off the water first.
sentences.chinese: 处理破裂水管时，一定要先把水关掉。

sentences.english: contamination of the local water supply
sentences.chinese: 当地供水受到污染

sentences.english: Will you water my houseplants while I’m away?
sentences.chinese: 我不在时你能给我家里的盆栽浇浇水吗？

sentences.english: The garden needs watering daily.
sentences.chinese: 花园每天都需要浇水。

detailed_translations.english: the clear liquid without colour, smell, or taste that falls as rain and that is used for drinking, washing etc
if you water plants or the ground they are growing in, you pour water on them

name: proof
trans: n. 证明；证据；校样；考验；验证；试验,adj. 防…的；不能透入的；证明用的；耐…的,vt. 试验；校对；使不被穿透

sentences.english: Their defences are proof against most weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们的防卫工事可以抵挡大多数武器的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: facts, information, documents etc that prove something is true

name: tight
trans: adj. 紧的；密封的；绷紧的；麻烦的；严厉的；没空的；吝啬的,adv. 紧紧地；彻底地

sentences.english: tight jeans
sentences.chinese: 紧身牛仔裤

sentences.english: My shoes were so tight that I could hardly walk.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子很紧，我几乎不能走路。

sentences.english: The jacket is rather a tight fit (= it fits too tightly ) .
sentences.chinese: 这件夹克衫太紧了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 紧的；密封的；绷紧的；麻烦的；严厉的；没空的；吝啬的
detailed_translations.english: tight clothes fit your body very closely, especially in a way that is uncomfortable
very firmly or closely

name: well
trans: n. 井；源泉,adj. 良好的；健康的；适宜的,adv. 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地,v. 涌出

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: James reads quite well for his age.
sentences.chinese: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.english: All the team played very well today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.english: Simon doesn’t work well under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 有压力时西蒙的工作表现就不好。

sentences.english: The festival was very well organized.
sentences.chinese: 节庆活动组织得很好。

sentences.english: The concert went very well.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会进行得非常顺利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地
detailed_translations.english: in a successful or satisfactory way
healthy

name: being
trans: n. 存在；生命；本质；品格,adj. 存在的；现有的

sentences.english: a law that first came into being in 1912
sentences.chinese: 于1912年制定的一条法律

sentences.english: human beings
sentences.chinese: 人

detailed_translations.english: existence

name: know
trans: vt. 知道；认识；懂得,vi. 了解；熟悉；确信

sentences.english: Who knows the answer?
sentences.chinese: 谁知道答案？

sentences.english: There are instructions telling you everything you need to know.
sentences.chinese: 操作指南会告诉你所有须知事项。

sentences.english: Didn’t you know that?
sentences.chinese: 你不知道那件事吗？

sentences.english: I know all about David and what he’s been up to!
sentences.chinese: 我对戴维和他一直在干什么都知道得一清二楚！

sentences.english: Let me know (= tell me ) what time you’re planning to arrive.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我你打算什么时候到。

sentences.english: I thought you’d want to know immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我以为你想马上知道。

sentences.english: If you must know, I was with James last night (= used when you are angry because someone wants to know something ).
sentences.chinese: 如果你非要知道的话，我昨晚是和詹姆斯在一起。

sentences.english: How did he know (= how did he find information about ) our names?
sentences.chinese: 他是怎么知道我们姓名的？

detailed_translations.english: to have information about something

name: where
trans: conj. 在…的地方,n. 地点,adv. 在哪里,pron. 哪里

sentences.english: Where are you going?
sentences.chinese: 你要到哪儿去？

sentences.english: Where do they live?
sentences.chinese: 他们住在哪里？

sentences.english: Do you know where my glasses are?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我的眼镜在哪儿吗？

sentences.english: Where would you like to sit?
sentences.chinese: 你想坐在哪里？

detailed_translations.english: in or to which place

name: as
trans: conj. 因为；随着；虽然；依照；当…时,prep. 如同；当作；以…的身份,adv. 同样地；和…一样的

sentences.english: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.english: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

sentences.english: Just as the two men were leaving, a message arrived.
sentences.chinese: 那两个男子刚要离开，消息就传来了。

detailed_translations.english: while or when

name: else
trans: adj. 别的；其他的,adv. 其他；否则；另外

sentences.english: There’s something else I’d like to talk about as well.
sentences.chinese: 我还有其他事情要谈一谈。

sentences.english: I’d like you to come, and anyone else who’s free.
sentences.chinese: 我想请你过来，其他人有空也可以来。

sentences.english: He was awake now, as was everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 他现在已经醒了，其他人也都醒了。

sentences.english: Who else was at the party?
sentences.chinese: 还有谁参加了聚会？

sentences.english: ‘Two coffees, please.’ ‘Anything else?’ ‘No, thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “请来两杯咖啡。”“还要别的吗？”“不要了，谢谢。

sentences.english: (= more than any other things ) she was seeking love.
sentences.chinese: 她追求爱情胜过一切。

sentences.english: If I can't make a living at painting, at least I can teach someone else to paint.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不能以画画谋生的话，至少我能教别人画画。

sentences.english: We had nothing else to do on those long trips.
sentences.chinese: 在那些漫长的旅途中我们别无他事可做。

detailed_translations.english: besides or in addition to someone or something
You use else after words such as "anywhere," "someone," and "what" to refer in a vague way to another person, place, or thing

name: who
trans: pron. 谁；什么人

sentences.english: Who locked the door?
sentences.chinese: 谁锁的门？

sentences.english: Who do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你为谁工作？

sentences.english: Who’s that guy with your wife?
sentences.chinese: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？

sentences.english: They never found out who the murderer was.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。

sentences.english: She wondered who had sent the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道是谁送的花。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is

name: ever
trans: adv. 永远；曾经；究竟

sentences.english: Nothing ever seems to upset him.
sentences.chinese: 似乎从来没有什么事情会使他烦恼。

sentences.english: Have you ever been to Paris?
sentences.chinese: 你去过巴黎吗？

sentences.english: I don’t think I’ve ever been here before.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我以前从未到过这里。

sentences.english: It was raining harder than ever.
sentences.chinese: 当时下着前所未有的大雨。

detailed_translations.english: used in negative sentences and questions, or sentences with if to mean ‘at any time’

name: thereby
trans: adv. 从而，因此；在那附近；在那方面

sentences.english: Our bodies can sweat, thereby losing heat by evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 我们的身体会流汗，由此能通过蒸发散热。

detailed_translations.english: with the result that something else happens

name: trademark
trans: n. 商标,标志

sentences.english: The striped T-shirt became the comedian’s trademark.
sentences.chinese: 条纹T恤衫成了这位喜剧演员的标记。

detailed_translations.chinese: 商标， 牌号； 特征， 标记
detailed_translations.english: a special name, sign, or word that is marked on a product to show that it is made by a particular company, that cannot be used by any other company

name: underdeveloped
trans: adj. 不发达的

sentences.english: a baby born with underdeveloped kidneys
sentences.chinese: 肾脏先天发育不全的婴儿

detailed_translations.english: a country, area etc that is poor and where there is not much modern industry

name: update
trans: n. 更新；现代化,vt. 更新；校正，修正；使现代化

sentences.english: The files need updating.
sentences.chinese: 这些档案需要更新。

detailed_translations.english: to add the most recent information to something
the most recent news or information about something

name: upgrade
trans: n. 升级；上升；上坡,vt. 使升级；提升；改良品种,adj. 向上的,adv. 往上

sentences.english: Helicopters have been upgraded and modernized.
sentences.chinese: 直升机已经升级并且装上现代化设备。

detailed_translations.english: to make a computer, machine, or piece of software better and able to do more things

name: upright
trans: n. 垂直；竖立,adj. 正直的，诚实的；垂直的，直立的；笔直的；合乎正道的

sentences.english: Katie was still awake, sitting bolt upright(= sitting with her back very straight ) staring at the television.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂还醒着，坐得笔直，眼睛盯着电视。

detailed_translations.chinese: 正直的，诚实的；垂直的，直立的；笔直的；合乎正道的
detailed_translations.english: standing or sitting straight up
a long piece of wood or metal that stands straight up and supports something

name: up-to-date
trans: adj. 最新的，最近的；现代的，新式的

sentences.english: ...the most up-to-date information available on foods today.
sentences.chinese: …今日有关食品的最新消息。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直到最近的， 现代的； 跟上时代的
detailed_translations.english: modern or fashionable

name: waterproof
trans: n. 防水材料,vt. 使防水,adj. 防水的，不透水的

sentences.english: a waterproof jacket
sentences.chinese: 防水上衣

sentences.english: waterproof adhesive
sentences.chinese: 防水黏合剂

sentences.english: Rub the wax in to make the shoe waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 在鞋子上抹点蜡使其防水。

detailed_translations.english: not allowing water to enter
a jacket or coat that does not allow rain and water through it

name: watertight
trans: adj. 水密的；不漏水的；无懈可击的

sentences.english: a watertight container
sentences.chinese: 不漏水的容器

detailed_translations.english: that does not allow water to get in or out

name: well-being
trans: n. 幸福；康乐

sentences.english: Singing can create a sense of well-being.
sentences.chinese: 唱歌能产生一种幸福感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 健康， 幸福； 福利
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being comfortable, healthy, and happy

name: well-known
trans: adj. 著名的；众所周知的；清楚明白的

sentences.english: This is probably their best-known song.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是他们最有名的歌曲。

sentences.english: a well-known TV presenter
sentences.chinese: 著名的电视节目主持人

detailed_translations.chinese: 众所周知的， 著名的
detailed_translations.english: known by a lot of people

name: whereas
trans: conj. 然而；鉴于；反之

sentences.english: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.
sentences.chinese: 旧系统相当复杂，而新系统却很简单。

sentences.english: Whereas the city spent over $1 billion on its museums and stadium, it failed to look after its schools.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市花了十亿美元建造博物馆和体育馆，但是却忽略了对学校的建设。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that although something is true of one thing, it is not true of another

name: elsewhere
trans: adv. 在别处；到别处

sentences.english: She is becoming famous in Australia and elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 她在澳大利亚和其他地方渐渐出名了。

sentences.english: Kerala has less crime and alcoholism than elsewhere in India.
sentences.chinese: 喀拉拉邦的犯罪和酗酒现象少于印度的其他地区。

detailed_translations.english: in, at, or to another place

name: whoever
trans: pron. 无论谁；任何人,n. 《爱谁谁》（电影名）

sentences.english: I’ll take whoever wants to go.
sentences.chinese: 谁想去我就带谁去。

sentences.english: When you’re done with the book, just give it to Kristin or Shelley or whoever.
sentences.chinese: 你看完书以后，就给克里斯廷或谢利，或者随便谁都行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谁； 无论谁； 究竟是谁
detailed_translations.english: used to say that it does not matter who does something, is in a particular place etc
